Package engine.render

Class Shader

java.lang.Object
engine.render.Shader
public class Shader extends Object
The Shader class is responsible for managing and handling shader programs in OpenGL.

    • Shader

      public Shader() throws Exception
      Constructs a new Shader and initializes the shader program.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a shader program cannot be created.

  • Method Details

    • createShader

      private int createShader(String shaderResource, int shaderType) throws Exception
      Creates a shader of the specified type using the provided shader resource.
      Parameters:
      shaderResource - The shader resource containing the shader code.
      shaderType - The type of shader, such as GL_VERTEX_SHADER or GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER.
      Returns:
      The ID of the created shader.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a shader cannot be created or compiled.
